thought: The Slack message action failed due to missing required parameters, especially the channel information. We need to set the Slack channel to #general with correct mode and value.
plan: Set 'select' parameter to 'channel' to specify sending to a Slack channel.
Set 'channelId' with mode 'name' and value '#general' to target the #general Slack channel.
Set 'messageType' to 'text' for simple message sending.
Map the 'text' field from input_data to 'text' parameter for message content.
Test sending Slack messages with these parameters.
